Title: Peter Rabbit
Writer: Rob Lieber (screen story by), Will Gluck (screen story by), Rob Lieber (screenplay by), Will Gluck (screenplay by), Beatrix Potter (based on the characters and tales of "Peter Rabbit" by)
Actors: James Corden, Fayssal Bazzi, Domhnall Gleeson, Sia
Plot: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.
Production: Animal Logic Entertainment, Olive Bridge Entertainment
